title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer with 5+ years of experience in React and modern CSS frameworks. You will be responsible for leading the frontend team and architecting scalable UI components for our core dashboard product.

title: Product Designer
description: Join our design team to create world-class user experiences for our fintech platform. You should have a strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in Figma, design systems, and user-centered design principles.

title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
description: We are seeking a Backend Engineer to build high-performance APIs and manage our distributed cloud infrastructure. Experience with PostgreSQL and AWS is highly preferred.

title: Frontend Intern
description: Perfect for a student or bootcamp grad! You will assist our senior devs in building responsive landing pages and learning the ropes of professional React development in a fast-paced environment.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Help us build the next generation of social networking apps using React Native. You will work on cross-platform features, push notifications, and offline data synchronization.

title: Data Analyst
description: Turn data into actionable insights. You will be responsible for building dashboards, writing complex SQL queries, and presenting findings to the executive team to drive business growth.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage our CI/CD pipelines and ensure 99.9% uptime for our global security platform. You should be comfortable with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and container orchestration.

title: Full Stack Intern
description: Experience life at a high-growth startup. You will work across the entire stack, from frontend animations to database migrations, under the mentorship of our CTO.
